Header.title: KNOW THE ‘WHY’ BEHIND THE PRICE
Header.paragraph: News-based stock predictions at your fingertips.

About.paragraph:
SentiStock is built for modern investors who want more than just numbers. We combine cutting edge AI with real time news to give you context behind market moves. Instead of scrolling through dozens of articles or relying on vague trends, we break down what's happening in a fast, clear, and relevant way focused on the stocks you care about. 
 
 Our system scans trusted news sources, evaluates sentiment, and delivers plain language insights directly to your dashboard. Whether it's an earnings report, a CEO statement, or a global event, SentiStock helps you understand how it could affect your investments. 
 
 We believe smart decisions start with smart information and we are here to make that simple for everyone.

Testimonials.text: "SentiStock told me my stock was tanking before my therapist did."
Testimonials.name: Panic Pete

Testimonials.text: "My investing strategy used to be vibes and luck. Now it’s vibes, luck, and actual news."
Testimonials.name: Crystal Ball Karen

Testimonials.text: "Got a notification from SentiStock before my ex replied to my text. Priorities."
Testimonials.name: Left On Read Larry

Testimonials.text: "I don’t know what half the terms mean but I click 'buy' with confidence now."
Testimonials.name: Clicky McRiski

Testimonials.text: "Made me feel like the wolf of Wall Street. Until I realized it was just a squirrel on Robinhood."
Testimonials.name: Leonardo deBagholder

Testimonials.text: "Honestly this site is the only green thing in my portfolio."
Testimonials.name: Down Bad Dave
